sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_yergb_bpm_quotation</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>version control</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	gs.addErrorMessage(current.version)
	current.version = current.version +1;

	//gs.addErrorMessage("ㅗㅑ2")
	//gs.addErrorMessage(current.version)

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-30 02:09:31</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>78889ce8932e42104d95f55a7bba106b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>version control</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="BPM" source="x_yergb_bpm">41c8a9e73b1e4a10ec3cbf2a85e45ab7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="BPM">41c8a9e73b1e4a10ec3cbf2a85e45ab7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_78889ce8932e42104d95f55a7bba106b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sungsoo@sorin.co.kr</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-07 10:05:45</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=78889ce8932e42104d95f55a7bba106b"/></record_update>
